item.title: Carma add a quote by Matthew Hughes
item.description: "a blossom past its perfection, shedding petals like a sad metaphor" -- Matthew Hughes

item.title: Carma add a quote by Christopher Buehlman
item.description: "That was a mean thought, and not funny at all. I let it turn to sand and blow out of my head." -- Christopher Buehlman

item.title: Carma add a quote by Margaret Ann Lembo
item.description: "Regardless of whether you are a man or a woman, everyone births things into reality." -- Margaret Ann Lembo

item.title: Carma add a quote by Sarah Schulman
item.description: "You have to notice the truth in order to be able to avoid it." -- Sarah Schulman

item.title: Carma add a quote by Martin Berman-gorvine
item.description: "A righteous man does not conceive of himself as righteous; he is "only doing what anyone else would do," except, of course, that no one else does it." -- Martin Berman-gorvine

item.title: Carma add a quote by Carma Spence
item.description: "It is a rare goal that has only one path." -- Carma Spence

item.title: Carma add a quote by Carma Spence
item.description: "Isn't it interesting how we often fight who we truly are, what we truly want and that which we truly deserve?" -- Carma Spence

item.title: Carma add a quote by Carma Spence
item.description: "The more you appreciate, the more you have to appreciate." -- Carma Spence

item.title: Carma add a quote by Cate Tiernan
item.description: "Being good is something that one must choose over and over again, every day, throughout the day, for the rest of one's life," Asher said. "A day is made of a thousand decisions, most small, some huge. With each decision you have the chance to work toward light, or sink toward darkness." -- Cate Tiernan
